meanings.sent2: They found a way to travel inexpensively.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could only sing inexpensively.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room inexpensively.
meanings.sent5: The magician made the rabbit disappear inexpensively.

meanings.definition: At a low price or cost
meanings.sent3: The cat learned to play the piano inexpensively.
meanings.sent4: His words cut through the silence inexpensively.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the masterpiece inexpensively.
